page.title: 09NEWS - SCHOOL OPENING
page.content: On the 22nd March our{school opening was opened officially by the Bishop of Colchester. We invited Patrick Appleford the song writer and the Mayor of Colchester. We had a service with singing and prayers. Afterwards the Bishop talked to us about when he went to Africa to teach the children and how they had to write on slates. After the service the parents were allowed a cup of tea and a few biscuits. Then they had a look round our new school and our work. Later Kathryn, Mark, Patrick and Jeff planted a tree at the front of the school. Just after the service twelve girls did some dancing for us and everybody liked them.
